mapper.select: SELECT A.USR_NM, B.BBR_NM, A.TEM_NM, A.PT_C_NM, NVL(OHR.F_DTM_ACT_TIME('01', REPLACE(#{username}, 'K', '7'), SYSDATE, '1', 'KO'), '휴무') AS STA_TIME, NVL(OHR.F_DTM_ACT_TIME('01', REPLACE(#{username}, 'K', '7'), SYSDATE, '2', 'KO'), '휴무') AS END_TIME FROM OEHR.THURXE_CUSRLI A INNER JOIN OEHR.THURXE_CORGLI B ON A.BBR_C = B.PRLM_OGZ_C_CONE WHERE A.ENO = #{username}
